comments:
Build: I20070501-0010

1) Capture sleak snapshot
2) Open exception breakpoint dialog
3) Wait until exceptions appear in the list
4) Close dialog
5) Capture sleak diff

-> Four images are leaked each time these steps are followed

It looks like ExceptionLabelProvider keeps the created images in a map, but then never disposes of the images (dispose method just clears the map).

Forgot to add a sample stack trace:
